Articles.Content:
Hi guys! I'm a game developer in training. I know intermediate level HTML, and goddamn I love KSP. My time playing it has been filled with fails, fails, a win, and lots of editing parts because I suck at the game. I do enjoy the game still, it's one of my favourites. I'd like to ask a quick question: Who here has attempted to make a game before? Anyways, thanks for reading this, and I look forward to playing alot more of KSP.

ALOT.
